name: get_all_predictions
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool daily_betting_tips.
Tool description: We provide 90% hit rate daily soccer and basketball betting predictions, Our predictions are generated by AI powered analysis of previous matches and other factors key to the game's result
API description: This Endpoint is used to load all Betting Tips from API the tips are organised into multiple coupons.
To load all tips organised in Ascending order pass parameter sort with value "-id".

connection.description: Specifies the connection type for the API request. Default is 'keep-alive'.

content_type.description: Sets the content type for the API request. Default is 'application/json'.

sort.description: Criterion for sorting the betting tips. Default is '-id' for descending order.
